name: Failure to Launch
description:
MINIGAMES AND FLYING?


In FAILURE TO LAUNCH, complete difficult minigames while also SIMULTANEOUSLY piloting a spaceship through an endless runner of obstacles. Danger is everywhere commander!

.

FAILURE IS AN OPTION


Fail a minigame or hit an obstacle, and your ship will meet a FIERY EXPLOSION. Are you skilled enough to drive and finish minigames AT THE SAME TIME? This game will put you to the multi tasking test!

.

BONUS FEATURES APLENTY


With weekly Leaderboard seasons, an Unlock Tree, Achievements, and over 30 whacky unlockable ships, backgrounds and ship trails, there are tons of progression to keep you striving for more. Shoot for the stars on our online Leaderboard and prove if you have what it takes!

.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2641590/Failure_to_Launch/
